ALBench.strategy.strategy_impl package¶

Submodules¶

ALBench.strategy.strategy_impl.random_sampling module¶

class ALBench.strategy.strategy_impl.random_sampling.RandomSampling(strategy_config, dataset)¶

Bases: src.skeleton.active_learning_skeleton.Strategy

select(trainer, budget)¶

Selecting a batch of examples based on output from the trainer.

Parameters

  • trainer (Trainer) – trainer object with most up-to-date model.

  • budget (int) – total batch size budget for the selection.

Returns

A list of indexes of the original dataset indexing the batch for annotation.

strategy_name = 'random'¶
